LanguageData.FishingSpeed.label: fishing speed
LanguageData.FishingSpeed.description: The speed at which this person catches fish.
LanguageData.FishingYield.label: fishing yield
LanguageData.FishingYield.description: The percentage yield this person receives when they fish.
LanguageData.PilotingAbility.label: piloting ability
LanguageData.PilotingAbility.description: How well this person can pilot a vehicle.
LanguageData.VacuumResistance.label: vacuum resistance
LanguageData.VacuumResistance.description: How resistant this creature is to the negative effects of the vacuum of space.
